tika-vin08t19:9_3: If you eat what has been stored indoors within the monastery, cooked indoors in a monastery, but cooked by others, you commit two offenses of wrong conduct.
tika-vin08t19:9_4: If you eat what has been stored outside, but cooked outside, yet cooked by yourselves, you commit two offenses of wrong conduct.

tika-vin08t19:9_8: If you eat what is outside the monastic boundary, but cooked outside, yet cooked by yourselves, you commit one offense of wrong conduct.
tika-vin08t19:9_9: If you eat what is outside, and cooked outside, and cooked by others, there is no offense.’
